before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"4gegu","text":"Make sure all proper permits are obtained. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ct056","text":"This project aims to examine the impact of dietary shifts and cultural changes on dental health disparities. Through a literature review and field surveys, it will explore historical and contemporary dietary patterns, cultural practices, and their effects on dental health. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"b3dqd","text":"1. Ethical Considerations:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fab8l","text":"Obtain informed consent from participants before conducting surveys, interviews, or dental examinations. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8p01f","text":"Ensure confidentiality of participant information and data.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f1pk3","text":"Respect cultural norms and practices when interacting with communities.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"enf2p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1g1o2","text":"2. Research Team:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6jgs","text":"Train research team members, including local dentists and surveyors, on research protocols and ethical guidelines.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"57et3","text":"Assign roles and responsibilities clearly within the team.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ap4r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a373u","text":"3. Data Collection:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kvd6","text":"Use standardized survey questionnaires and interview guides to ensure consistency in data collection.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7j4n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4psim","text":"4. Community Engagement:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ngl2","text":"Engage with community leaders and members to gain their trust and support for the research project.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bemb1","text":"Communicate clearly about the purpose and goals of the research to the community.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"gttc","text":"Involve community members in the research process where possible.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ffut4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8a67","text":"5. Sustainability:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5n6dq","text":"Consider the long-term impact of the research and how it can contribute to sustainable improvements in dental health in the Pacific Island region.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"33a39","text":"Identify opportunities for further research or interventions based on the findings of the study.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64vs3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9msv","text":"6. Collaboration:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5itat","text":"Collaborate with local healthcare providers, researchers, and policymakers to ensure that the research is relevant and impactful.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ef62p","text":"Share knowledge and best practices with other researchers and organizations working in the field of dental health disparities.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"efctd","text":"- Survey Questionnaires","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3kib2","text":"- Dental Examination Tools","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3avjg","text":"- Interview Guides","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7g4la","text":"- Data Collection Forms","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"49o7t","text":"- Brochures, posters, and pamphlets on maintaining healthy Oral Health ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6cdfn","text":"- Computers/ Laptops","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1o0bp","text":"- Consent Forms","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8vkin","text":"- Permission Letters","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ogdo","text":"- Digital Cameras","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3utr3","text":"- Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkgiv","text":"- First Aid Kit","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dloee","text":"- Storage Containers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b1jra","text":"Identify relevant literature on historical dietary patterns, cultural practices, oral health knowledge, and the impact of colonialism on the South Pacific Islands' populations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ekfuo","text":"Pre-Colonial Era:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fk509","text":"Gather historical data through archaeological findings, anthropological studies, and documented accounts.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9m0h6","text":"Use this data to reconstruct dietary habits and oral health practices of pre-colonial Pacific Island communities.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6hc80","text":"Quantitative Data:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7mudj","text":"Contemporary Era:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"13rhl","text":"Conduct field surveys and interviews within selected populations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4parp","text":"Assess current dietary patterns, oral hygiene practices, and the prevalence of dental diseases.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4la9u","text":"Utilize dental examinations, surveys, and interviews to collect quantitative and qualitative data.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bcm1u","text":"Qualitative Data:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4o7f0","text":"Analyze dental examination results and survey responses using statistical techniques.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cbldr","text":"Identify patterns and associations between dietary habits, oral hygiene practices, and dental health outcomes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d19g8","text":"Analyze interview transcripts thematically to extract key insights and narratives.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"iquk","text":"Explore the cultural and social factors influencing dental health in the region.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2opaa","text":"Compile and review the literature to gain insights into the historical context and factors influencing dental health disparities in the region.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8nafg","text":"Obtain necessary permissions from local authorities, schools, and parents to conduct the survey.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bn6e9","text":"Prepare survey questionnaires with questions related to oral hygiene practices, dietary habits, and dental health knowledge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4if7d","text":"Assemble a team of local dentists and trained surveyors to conduct the field survey. Ensure that the survey team is familiar with the survey questionnaire and protocols.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2r4ke","text":"Select a representative sample of grade schools from different regions or communities within the Pacific Island region.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8mo81","text":"Divide the students into groups based on grade level or age for ease of survey administration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1rv6k","text":"Include questions such as:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cu49f","text":"How many times a day do you brush your teeth?","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2juup","text":"What is your typical diet like? How often do you consume sugary foods and drinks?","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2he7t","text":"Have you ever had a toothache or dental problems? Have you visited a dentist before?","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7msse","text":"Do you have access to dental care in your community? If yes, how often do you get checked?","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eoknv","text":"Examining each individual's teeth.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"55vs3","text":"Distribute the survey questionnaires to the students and provide instructions for completing them.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bc24o","text":"Conduct follow-up research to assess the effectiveness of proposed solutions and interventions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"66fb0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4mevs","text":"Continue to monitor dental health trends in the region and advocate for policies that promote improved dental health outcomes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: From Taro Roots to Dental Roots
title_html: From Taro Roots to Dental Roots

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"ask4s","text":"Health and Safety: Take necessary precautions to ensure the health and safety of the research team and participants, especially when conducting dental examinations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
